title: Noita
altText: Altar covered in runes surrounded by green flame with the title 'Noita' over top
text: Noita is a magical action roguelite set in a world where every pixel is physically simulated. Fight, explore, melt, burn, freeze, and evaporate your way through the procedurally generated world using spells you've created yourself.

title: Terraria
altText: 2 knights, a man, and a dryad stand in a field of green with small animals.
text: Terraria is an open-world survival game where players dig, build, and fight to survive in a procedurally generated 2D world.

title: Balatro
altText: Red and blue wisps surround the title text Balatro
text: Balatro is a roguelike deckbuilder where players collect and use cards to create powerful combinations in a unique, procedurally generated world.

title: Baldur's Gate 3
altText: A High Elf, Human, and Githyanki appear in a fog covered land with tentacles.
text: Baldur's Gate 3 is an epic RPG with turn-based combat, set in the Dungeons & Dragons universe. Explore, strategize, and make choices that shape your unique adventure.

title: Exanima
altText: Warrior kneeling in a dark catacomb filled with undead.
text: Exanima is a unique physics-based dungeon crawler focused on complex melee combat and exploration, featuring detailed, dynamic environments.

title: ULTRAKILL
altText: Blue humanoid robot mid air firing a shotgun and pistol
text: ULTRAKILL is a fast-paced retro-style FPS where players blast through demonic hordes using a unique blood-fueled healing mechanic.

title: UFO 50
altText: Space pirate Alpha wields her blaster, unaware of the alien slug lodged in the barrel.
text: UFO 50 is a collection of fifty retro-style games created by a group of developers, offering a variety of genres in one unique package.

title: Wildermyth
altText: A party of three adventurers and their companion pet face off against a horde of invading monsters.
text: Wildermyth is a character-driven, procedurally generated RPG where players guide a band of heroes across multiple generations in a comic-style world.

title: Pizza Tower
altText: A stressed chef holding common pizza toppings.
text: Pizza Tower is a fast-paced platformer inspired by the Wario Land series. Play as Peppino Spaghetti, a nervous and overweight Italian trying to save his pizzeria from destruction.

title: RimWorld
altText: View of an undeveloped planet from orbit with the Title RimWorld overlapping the stars.
text: RimWorld is a sci-fi colony sim driven by an AI storyteller. Manage colonists, fend off threats, and watch your story unfold as you try to survive in a distant world.

title: Guilty Gear Strive
altText: A blonde haired swordsman and a black haired swordsman bumping fists.
text: Guilty Gear Strive is the latest entry in the acclaimed Guilty Gear series, featuring intense 2D fighting gameplay and an immersive story mode.

title: Duck Game
altText: Humanoid Duck in industrial setting fires their gun at an enemy below.
text: Duck Game is a chaotic and fast-paced multiplayer game where players control armed ducks in various stages, battling for supremacy in quick, explosive matches.

title: Barony
altText: A rougue, a warrior, and a wizard fend off a swarm of enemies in a dungeon.
text: Barony is a first-person roguelike RPG with cooperative multiplayer, where players navigate challenging dungeons filled with monsters, traps, and loot.

title: Elden Ring
altText: A series of interlocking golden runes shine in the sky over a vast foggy land.
text: Elden Ring is an expansive action RPG set in a dark fantasy world, featuring vast exploration, intricate lore, and challenging combat.

title: Lethal League Blaze
altText: Stitched up baseball player winds up a swing of their bat.
text: Lethal League Blaze is a high-speed competitive ball game where players use powerful strikes and special abilities to outmaneuver and eliminate opponents.

title: Medieval Dynasty
altText: Peasant draws a bow to defend his village and family.
text: Medieval Dynasty combines survival, simulation, and RPG elements, placing players in a medieval open world where they build, manage, and expand their own village.

title: Subnautica
altText: Scuba diver swims with local boomerang shaped fauna outside of their large submarine.
text: Subnautica is an open-world survival game set in an alien ocean, where players explore, gather resources, and uncover the mysteries of the deep.

title: Green Hell
altText: Injured man collapsed against boulder in the jungle.
text: Green Hell is a survival game set in the Amazon rainforest. Players must gather resources, craft, and stay alive while facing both the environment and psychological challenges.

title: Dredge
altText: Dark clouds roll in behind a lighthouse as a lone fishing boat braves the ocean waves.
text: DREDGE is a single-player fishing adventure with a sinister undercurrent. Sell your catch, upgrade your boat, and dredge the depths for long-buried secrets. Explore a mysterious archipelago and discover why some things are best left forgotten.

title: Disco Elysium
altText: A disheveled man with mutton chops stands next to a clean man with glasses as they brandish pistols.
text: Disco Elysium is a groundbreaking RPG with a focus on storytelling, where players take on the role of a detective solving a murder in a deeply flawed city.

title: Inscryption
altText: A face covered in shadow plays a card game in the dark.
text: Inscryption is a dark and twisted deck-building game that blends roguelike mechanics, puzzle-solving, and narrative-driven gameplay in a unique horror atmosphere.

title: Nuclear Throne
altText: A variety of armed and dangerous mutants sit around a campfire listening to a fishman play the guitar.
text: Nuclear Throne is a top-down, post-apocalyptic roguelike shooter where players fight their way through mutant-filled levels to reach the ultimate goal: the Nuclear Throne.

title: World of Horror
altText: A group of monstrous school girls pose for a class photo.
text: World of Horror is a retro-styled, cosmic horror RPG where players investigate paranormal events in a small Japanese town, battling dark forces and uncovering terrifying secrets.
